snippet: On Thursday at the Visa Pour l’Image festival in Perpignan, France, a Getty Images Grant for editorial photography was awarded to Eugene Richards — allowing him to expand on his work documenting Iraq war veterans in the United States — and...
abstract: On Thursday at the Visa Pour l’Image festival in Perpignan, France, a Getty Images Grant for editorial photography was awarded to Eugene Richards — allowing him to expand on his work documenting Iraq war veterans in the United States — and others.

headline.main: Getty Images Announces Winners of Photography Grants
